level._levelSize: it is used to express the height and width of a level
level._ballboyComment: Your main character can be normal or large. What pixel dimensions these match can be up to you.
level._ballboyPosComment: ballboy start at the x and y position indicated. This must be a positive double.
level._cloudVelocityComment: Clouds should move the given number of pixels per second. This must be a positive double. This is not a required feature in assignment 2 but we leave it here as a sample only for students who are interested in this feature.
